ModMetaData.name: CTB-AT Equipment Expanded
ModMetaData.author: azrazalea (originally by Aos Si)
ModMetaData.description:
Enhanced compatibility bridge between Colonist Tech Background and Arcane Technology with comprehensive mod support.
Features: • Realistic tech level requirements - if a tribal can figure out how to use it, they can use it! • Extensive mod compatibility - supports VFE series, Medieval Overhaul, Combat Shields, Alpha Mechs, and more • Simple Sidearms integration - tech-appropriate pawns can use research-locked weapons as sidearms
Tech Philosophy: • Neolithic pawns can use traditional melee weapons and shields (intuitive to use) • Medieval pawns can additionally use armor, crossbows, and early firearms • Industrial pawns can use modern firearms and advanced equipment
Supported Mods: • Medieval Overhaul (160+ items) • VFE Classical, Medieval II, Tribals, Pirates • Combat Shields • Alpha Mechs • Simple Sidearms • These are Spacer Tech
Note: This mod replaces Arcane Technology's Simple Sidearms patch to provide enhanced tech background integration.
